website_summaries.verdict: An extremely customizable PS4 controller designed for eSports and dedicated online competition.
pros: companion app allows button remapping, trigger sensitivity, vibration motors, etc
Includes button layout shortcut switch and custom LED colors
cons: Fine-tuning isn’t necessary for most players

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: It just not worth what they want for it. It's not comfortable. They said it's almost same like the xbox controller... no, it's not. Before you buy it go somewhere and try it or touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Seagal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.... WHEN IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th remote [thats how much I like it] and it has failed the same as all 3 before. The M2 button has failed 4 times and the M! button has failed 1 time [the same time as the M1 BUTTON]. All the failures you can hear a "snap" type of sound and the button no longer has any spring, its "dead". I tried calling Nacon direct to let them know of the defect and they say they cant speak with me and to go directly to where it was purchased. Its a shame because I would have given it 5 stars but if it always breaks ....
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Play as God intended. Map L3/R3 to M1/M2. Never look back.
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my hands! I and my no-longer-aching thumb joints are thankful for it every day. Whoever thought the left-analog stick should be located way off near the center of a controller--I curse that person. L3 and R3 are the work of the devil. The XBox Elite controller is the most ergonomic and good-feeling controller I've ever held in my hands. This PS4 controller is a very close second and the closest approximation available for PS4. My one and only complaint is that the vibration function is too much stronger than the standard PS4 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This review is more about the company website. To be able to program or customize the controller you need to download and install the software from their website. But you have to register which I did. But I never got the "verification email" so my account is not accessible. So I can't download the software. To contact support for help you need to login to your account. But I can't because it's not VERIFIED! And around and around we go. So it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the high price
customer_reviews.text: The paddle design is much better than its competitors, but thats about the only for sure good thing I can say. The right stick is mildly broken after only a couple months of use. The overall shape makes it so you frequently hit the L1 and R1 when you didnt mean to. Also the extra top buttons might as well not exist, since they are so hard to press. Also this thing is extremely expensive. I prefer the staggered stick design but I think there must be better options out there for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Valenzo

customer_reviews.title: Crappy audio jack, breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: Decent controller and would have 5 stars but the biggest problem is the headphone jack stopped working after a few weeks. If i plug it in all the way only one side has sound. If i plug it halfway in then the mic doesn’t work. Sucks big time because it affects playing. With friends
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Almost a perfect pro controller for the PS4
customer_reviews.text: I like the controller a lot, the only thing I wish they did would have been similar to the pro controller for the Nintendo Switch with a seemless back, after a couple hours of play, is my hand slightly cramping due to the hooked design on the back end near the L2 and R2. Other than that I love this controller. Still trying to figure out the button mapping for the back trigger as I can get my Nancon pro 2 to register on the Nacon website, wished they had a mobile app like the Razer Raiju has for theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Thickbass21

customer_reviews.title: Buttons and triggers get stuck.
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and design of the controller and maybe it's just a defective controller I got but the d pad and triggers constantly get stuck in the depressed position. This is problematic for shooters as i can't get out of aiming down sights quickly. So quality assurance is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Cruise Landon Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: The controller is great quality, well build, etc, etc, etc. It did not connect to my Mac nor allows you to do macros anymore even tho that it says it does, also is not wireless even tho it says it does. I tried to return it but Amazon did not allowed it because I took too long so now I'm stuck with a controller that only works while wired and is even not confy to play with so its $120 waisted
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: Weird Controller Ever
customer_reviews.text: Clicky and Awkward shape trigger. stick is too high. nice to adjust weight. shame that I can't change the vibration intensity from PS4. Not worth for the premium price. returning this. I rather purchase X box controller and it's usb - PS4 converter
customer_reviews.author: Ho C.

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it but...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: configurable and customizable. Corded so great response time for inputs. I also liked the joystick length and configuration. Cons: extremely unnatural position for the R1, R2, L1 and L2 buttons. I used the controller for one long session at 4 hrs and my left index finger was in so much pain I had to stop using it. I actually switched back to my old controller.
customer_reviews.author: MamaOsa

customer_reviews.title: Good controller, but has an ongoing issue!
customer_reviews.text: There are a number of complains regarding the headphone jack; the microphone hardly picks up any sound, or no sound at all. Unfortunately, i have the same issue. In the forums, people who contacted Nicon were advised to unplug the headset and controller, then replug the headset to the controller, then the controller to the console (while console is powered). This doesn't always resolve the issue, as in my case. Nicon said that a future firmware update will address this issue, this was 8 months ago. I am returning this controller in exchange for another new one. I'd like to note that the rest of the features on the controller work as intended. I had no further issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stóli

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but not for me
customer_reviews.text: In terms of build quality, this product is amazing. The materials used are high quality and the overall construction is solid. Button actuation give a lot of feed back and feels like it will last a long time. The same can be said regarding the control sticks and various triggers. I specially love the placement of the additional triggers/paddles. My only gripe is that the controller is pretty hefty. The weight is nice, but it tends to strain my hands after a couple of hours. I also wish that it had a more standard length joy stick instead of the taller ones.
customer_reviews.author: HeyoPrinsen

customer_reviews.title: i probably should have researched it a bit more but the button remapping wasnt working despite how easy it was to set up
customer_reviews.text: I returned this, i probably should have researched it a bit more but the button remapping wasnt working despite how easy it was to set up. I downloaded the updates on the PC and my profiles seemed like they were all ready but I couldnt get them to work in-game, at least in Destiny 2. The bumpers and triggers were not completely comfortable but I did like the weight of this one. I went for the cheaper Horipad FPS which had no button mapping and is almost too light, but gives a slightly better XB1 feel.
customer_reviews.author: William Nostrand

customer_reviews.title: Xbox 1 body/PS4 contols.
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller. Very sturdy, custom button format changes to your needs on Software program (download from website). I like the xbox 1 controllers much better built because PS4 controllers are just plain cheesy. So a xbox1 body/PS4 setup controls. Just awesome with the new Nacon rev2, they use a pin/coaxl cable theat aren't sold in the USA, but with this one is a Type C USB which is not bad, but sold here in the U.S. Great Controller for PS4 or (PS4pro).
customer_reviews.author: bSTiLL

customer_reviews.title: decent, but has issues of course
customer_reviews.text: I will be completely honest about this product. Triggers, bumpers, and software are great. Sticks are too loose though and the bulges that come out from under the triggers are too big. They hinder how comfort and how you can hold the controller. Wouldn't recommend over some other controllers. I should add that mine came defective, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: elvin

customer_reviews.title: Look No Batteries, and Less Lag Time
customer_reviews.text: Had this controller for a month and so far so good. Works great and the response time has improved my gaming with no lag time. Hopefully the USB cable will last longer than 6 months, as others have failed with internal shorts after several months of use with the PS4 standard controllers. Many other useful features and functions, but check them out for yourself at their website, to get the correct info. Would be a five rating but only had unit for a month so it can change within the next year after a long term use review.
customer_reviews.author: RudeDude

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $125.00
customer_reviews.text: The main reason why I purchased this controller because I hate the huge typing button in the middle of the dual shock 4 controller. But it seems this controller have the same issue; I also hate the fact you have to connect it to a Mac or Windows computer just to adjust the controller settings vs being able to do it on your ps4. Over all I am very dissatisfied with this item, and don't think it's worth $125.00.
customer_reviews.author: quentin

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and spot on accuracy but.......
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels good Edit today 7-22-19 After storing the controller for some time, I decided to start using it. Two days in the up on d pad gets stuck. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Queen

customer_reviews.title: no bluetooth or macros
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit optimistic about the custom buttons when buying this product. I thought, yeah of course it supports macros or in other words a set of button taps with one button click... it did not and the application really needs some work.. Also I thought I would mention no bluetooth support... Seems pretty normal to have bluetooth but I guess these guys said oh nevermind that... I should have spent a extra 30 bucks for the Razer with bluetooth...
customer_reviews.author: acerbic

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pro gaming controller yields cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: I give it a star because if you don’t use the headphone jack, it’s a very decent controller. However. I randomly lost audio on the left ear, and I thought it was the headphones until I tested it with another pair. Same result. I took very good care of this controller, and still it malfunctions. So I return it and receive a new controller. Yay! All good for a few weeks, then boom. No audio in left ear again. Returning for the last time and buying a Scuff. Don’t waste your time and money on this cheap pro controller, you’ll only get half your money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming decision I ever made
customer_reviews.text: An elitist Pro Controller and comfortable to the T. Does get a little complicated with all of the profiles. But it does all that and a bag of tricks I love the lighting and everything is easy access and thought of. I even put some stickers on my other devices it was so fun. Now I play like a pro and play like a champ every time. I feel like I'm in the commander seat with this one. A must-have if you're into gaming and such.
customer_reviews.author: Trixen3

customer_reviews.title: Dont go for this controller
customer_reviews.text: Edit: finally found a cable that fit and it wasnt the cable it is the controller that is not working.... just 3 month with the controller and is already giving problems, I think is the cable but the way the controller is made is imposible to fit any other cable. A controller so expensive but they didnt see a giant flaw on the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best controllers I ever brought. I will never buy another regular PS4 controller again.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Good controller, just the audio port really sucks
customer_reviews.text: Good controller fits in my hands, has good handling, very responsive. Great if you play by yourself, but it's pointless if you play with friend's. The audio port for the headset do want work. I've tried multiple headsets including Astros, and still my friends say I sound like a robot or it's constantly cutting out. So it's either shell out more money from r another controller, or spend more money on a wireless headset. I've gotten better audio performance from way cheaper controllers. Gonna get the PS4 bumpers and see if they work better
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson spent his Christmas money to purchase this product and it has slowly kept messing up on different areas. Now we are sitting with it in a box because it will not even work now with his headset along with other areas not working. I am more upset for him with this purchase. We just had purchased this the 30th of December and it messed up in less than a month but he kept on using it and then finally down by the first week of February. I will be doing my best to get a refund/return of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Improvement from the first but still a litte bit BIG
customer_reviews.text: Better improved version of the first but its still a really large controller. I think it couldve been shrink to the size of an xbox controller.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vang

customer_reviews.title: love delivery and price
customer_reviews.text: I did get this with great discounted price. It was amazing that to get it with this price. for pad itself, compare to ps4 pad, 3 things are what I don't like but I was aware this. 1. the clicking feeling is not smooth like ps4. 2. cannot turn on PS4 with PS button 3. wired I am playing just casual game not required many key mapping. so I can't review about this advantage for this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: This is not a wireless controller.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was wireless. Other that that it's a nice controller. No speaker or light bar I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew H.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons birthday... I was the best mom ever lol. He absolutely loved it. Much cheaper than other controllers with same quality
customer_reviews.author: Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: I think its great for someone with larger hands like myself
customer_reviews.text: I think its great for someone with larger hands like myself. The only real gripe I have is the touch pad is to close to the left analog. If your thumb slips off that left stick even slightly it will run up against that pad and interrupt the game. Outside of that I think it’s really well done, you’re given weights to adjust the weight of the controller, even though it’s wired the cord is very long and very rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Ian George

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: i just didnt like the button lay out , but good item
customer_reviews.author: larry johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great pro controller
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Works great! And buttons feel amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Palatucci

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I ignored some of the reviews of this controller in favor of trying it out myself. Right out of the box, plugged it in, everything seems to be going well to I realize that the R1 button isn't working at all. Brand new, never been opened and it's defective. Already started the process of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross L.

customer_reviews.title: Low durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this controller for six months, after 6 months the headjack will not send audio to fully functional headsets. I don’t want to buy a new a one.
customer_reviews.author: brian birchett

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product I wish in the future to add more languages and add Arabic in the programs
customer_reviews.author: Lqnoa

customer_reviews.title: No macros
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall feel of the controller but bought to have the macro option they apparently took away not to long ago. Kind of expensive for what you get but its deffinetly better than regular ps4 controller.
customer_reviews.author: John Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: Owned V1, returned in after a few days, Tried V2 returned instantly: JOKE
customer_reviews.text: This controller is wired overpriced trash. The bumper buttons are a joke, the customization buttons on the rear of the controller are a joke. Overpriced wired trash.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Strider

customer_reviews.title: Solid controller/ not a good option for 2d fighters.
customer_reviews.text: Great controller! Takes a little while getting acclimated to it but the payoff is definitely worth it. Would not recommend for 2d fighters because the d pad is hit or miss. But for FPS it is where you will get your bang for your buck. Would suggest making this your primary controller (besides 2d fighters) so as to make the acclimation period smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!! Must buy !
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product !!! Wish the right analog stick had more tension... But aside from that, it's perfect. Don't listen to any of the negative reviews on this product . It's seriously worth every penny . Shipped on time! 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be buying the next version.
customer_reviews.text: This controller is awesome. It was a toss up between this, the Razor Tournament Edition or the Suff Vantage. I am so glad I went with one because the price was upwards of $40 cheaper and it fits my hands so well. Will definitely be buying the next version.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah Truitt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: My controller came broken or something because when I plug in the mic it does not work I tried fixing it in settings checking to see if it was the mics problem but it turns out something is wrong with the controller
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ayala 18

customer_reviews.title: Decent controller
customer_reviews.text: Works good but the back buttons have problems every now and then
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Buying a used controller
customer_reviews.text: Something was wrong with the right trigger. It didn't respond when pulling the trigger. One of those worries about buying a used controller.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Best freaking controll to the ps4 and i got a ...
customer_reviews.text: Best freaking controll to the ps4 and i got a scuf impact and this is way comfortable and easy to press the buttons on the back, construction is more solid than the scuff tl. You put the 2 side to side and the scuff looks cheap .
customer_reviews.author: adanzx3

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass on this
customer_reviews.text: 1) d-pad started squeking after 1 week. 2) R2 randomly engaged & locked on PS4. 3) PC software (download) registration was not an option for U.S residents. 4) d-pad location is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I had the first one and it lasted for about a year but i loved it so i bought this one. Lasted about a week then started having issues with the joysticks that made it unusable for FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with PlayStation now
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking controller but does not work with PlayStation now, the computer does not recognize it in PlayStation mode, and in PC mode the touchpad doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: quant

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: I like the layout. It’s a bit confusing at first(mapping). The triggers feel stiff? The original ps4 controller triggers feel softer and react better. In my opinion. If you get a good deal on one, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Melena

customer_reviews.title: Great budget-friendly "pro" controller option
customer_reviews.text: Controller is very solid feeling, very natural in larger hands. The ability to customize settings makes this more then worth the price. However, v2 does not support macros or 2:1 button mapping, which was my mistake when I ordered this. 5 stars for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamSmith93

customer_reviews.title: great for FPS
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and feels good in your hands. Not really the best if you are playing e-sports games but it is killer for upping you FPS game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: One of my back buttons stopped working 4 months in. Not even a button that was spammed. Pretty disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Joysticks felt very loose an made noise when being moved around. Tried to return it but did not meet the time deadline due to work.
customer_reviews.author: justin t.

customer_reviews.title: Great controller for less than its competitors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller. Bought it to replace an aging PS4 controller I had. The only thing I don’t like about it is the angle of the shoulder buttons, but with some getting used to it i may not mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cuddington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome controller
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic. Awesome triggers/bumpers. Excellent D-pad for fighting games also. Headphone jack works like I expected, overall, love this controller.
customer_reviews.author: allen r purvis

customer_reviews.title: cable problems
customer_reviews.text: started having problems with the cable connection after a few months, not worth the high price because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyokan

customer_reviews.title: Was sold a defective product.
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. Bought a nice set of headphones for son to use with this and the plug for the mic doesn’t work. Only get sound out of the right or left speaker.
customer_reviews.author: William Russo

customer_reviews.title: good up to 2 months. not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: played great for the first 2.5 months, now the left analog sticks during use.
customer_reviews.author: ImGhost29

customer_reviews.title: Failed Headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, and I was really excited to start using it, but the headphone jack stopped working very quickly as I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: pmac

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. Just save yourself the hassle. This is my second time buying it -- both times within months the controller has broker. Analog drift the first and second time. Just buy the og controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Always disconnects
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great controller with great modes I have bought it for my little brother as a gift he likes it the only issue he had was disconnecting randomly.
customer_reviews.author: F A

customer_reviews.title: Up button on the d-pad can stick
customer_reviews.text: Up button on the d-pad can stick sometimes, and is very annoying when it does happen
customer_reviews.author: pierson

customer_reviews.title: Extra buttons not usuable after a month
customer_reviews.text: The back buttons which are half the reason I ordered this, failed after about a month of use. I don’t know if I got a lemon or this is just how they all are. Besides that I really enjoy the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Solid controller used it for a good few months now. Feels a bit different...maybe cheap at first, but its solid. Numerous ways to change the aux buttons. Its solid 10/10 would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Send it back
customer_reviews.text: Was great out of the box for the first 2 nights of using. It has now destroyed 2 headsets! Its a POS better off buying two original controllers and hoping one doesnt soon develop a defect!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Kline

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this controller I've been using it for a few months now and it still works like the first day, I've improved my game play a lot in fortnite with it
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Very decent product.
customer_reviews.text: The controller had only one issue and it was the k pad, it gets stuck when I press the button.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Look at other brands
customer_reviews.text: Product stop working properly on March 2019 sent an email o response
customer_reviews.author: Joy Guidry

customer_reviews.title: I love the setup
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i dont like about this controller is the R1 and R2 buttons. The angle they are is so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product was received on time. A connector was missing from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK the buttons are kind of funny real loose feel like it’s broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after 6 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: It worked quite good while it lasted. One of the bottom buttons does not work after just using it for a little more than a month
customer_reviews.author: Ed Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the product while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product while it lasted. Within eight months of purchase I have noticed the L2 trigger has started to stick. I was dealing with it no problem until now my R1 Trigger is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not even a year and headphones do not work. The connection cable is falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Matteo C.

customer_reviews.title: Very horrible product even worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: It broke after a month. Just aster the warranty from Amazon expired I sent in a customer support email yo bacon and have never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Could be better for the price honestly. But still legit compare to scuff or others competitors
customer_reviews.author: clement joyeux

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Headphone jack suddenly stopped working, only plays audio from the right side
customer_reviews.author: A.P

customer_reviews.title: It is a good controller mimics an xbox one elite controller beautifully
customer_reviews.text: It is a good controller mimics an xbox one elite controller beautifully. My only issues are that the D Pad has started to squeak on the controller and the controller not being wireless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Controller was damaged when I got it, not in the original box, buttons were broken. Worst product I’ve ever tried. If I could give this product zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the 84 dollar edition
customer_reviews.text: This product was messed up by seller, wires were cut,and so controller will not turn on
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: The controller is alsome right out of the box you ...
customer_reviews.text: The controller is alsome right out of the box you can remap your own control buttons to any game you want
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Litty
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. Sticks are very precise. Love the back buttons. Took a little while to get used to but so glad I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use headphones with
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle. But the headphone jack always breaks. It’s the second on i own and it did the same thing. No response from the creators.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell D

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Headphone jack stopped working the day after the return window closed. Attempted to contact Namco about the warranty with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW

customer_reviews.title: IT IS AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: The Controller was awsome and so worth its price, and it has a good and confertable grip.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulwahab alnami

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $100.00
customer_reviews.text: The longer thumb sticks hurts my hand, the controller has a lot of input LAG. Returned the controller the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Teng

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: As of writing this I've had this controller for over 1 year with absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great controller especially if you’re used to Xbox controllers
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the thumb sticks are great once worn in a bit. A bit squeaky at first but I didn’t mind it
customer_reviews.author: SimmieOtto

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Broke in a month with 0 customer service help product is trash
customer_reviews.author: jgirard7

customer_reviews.title: Ok but..
customer_reviews.text: Head phone jack is not so good. Broke within a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Triggers SUCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: The controller having bad triggers hurts the overall experience. The triggers are concave/flattopped and doesn’t feel good at all. If they would have just straight up copied the Xbox One’s triggers or even the Dual shock 4’s this controller would’ve been a 5 out of 5... Hope my feedback is listened too and the version 3’s have better triggers.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work

customer_reviews.title: I like the remote a lot bit I only had the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the remote a lot bit I only had the remote for a couple of months and one of the back buttons doesn’t feel clicky anymore still works but it’s annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carmona

customer_reviews.title: It came good no damage
customer_reviews.text: I like that they shipped it as soon as possible
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Joysticks make noises pretending they are old and rusty. I feel that in general this controller is somewhat better than original ps4 controller but the difference is not worth expense. Profiles are nice; I tried to play Destiny2 with several different profiles and found them make me either too slow, or too fast. Default neutral settings work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Shpak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller is great. Excellent quality build and much better then a Dualshock 4 in my opinion. I highly recommend this for anyone interested!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this controller after burning through 2 Dual Shock controllers for my PS4. The quality of this is outstanding. It allows for excellent customization as far as button layouts, stick sensitivity, controller weight, and vibration sensitivity. The wired connection reduces input lag and offers an extra long cable. It allows for different button layout profiles which are easy to switch through. The price is steep, but worth it for those that want a lasting, quality controller.
customer_reviews.author: WombatSniffer

customer_reviews.title: Left thumb stick stop working
customer_reviews.text: Stop working in less than 6 months, email company and they dont replace defective items

customer_reviews.title: Not worth It
customer_reviews.text: I love Xbox controllers, especially the stick placement, so I wanted something similar for PS4. This doesn't have the right feel to it. Plus, the sticks are goofy sizes so Kontrolfreeks don't fit the damn things.
